nodes.description: 88人死于 volleyball 比赛现场自杀式爆炸，42人受伤
nodes.support_text: At least 88 people have been killed after a suspected suicide bomb attack at a volleyball match.

nodes.description: 袭击导致房屋倒塌，部分人员被困瓦砾下
nodes.support_text: It is understood some people were trapped under rubble after a house collapsed.

nodes.description: 警方确认袭击为塔利班关联势力所为，但具体过程尚无定论
nodes.support_text: Local police have said 42 people were wounded. It is understood some people were trapped under rubble after a house collapsed.

nodes.description: 目击者称袭击者驾车冲入场地自爆
nodes.support_text: Eye witnesses say they saw the bomber drive a vehicle onto the playing field and blow himself up.

nodes.description: 袭击发生时现场有青少年、老年人及儿童等观众
nodes.support_text: The bomber struck as young men in a village near the town of Lakki Marwat were playing volleyball in front of a crowd of spectators, including elderly residents and children.

nodes.description: 袭击与当天巴基斯坦反暴力抗议活动同步发生
nodes.support_text: The bombing has occurred on a day of protests against violence in Pakistan.

nodes.description: 卡拉奇因宗教集会自杀式爆炸（43人死亡）引发全城罢工
nodes.support_text: Pakistan's commercial capital Karachi nearly shut down as religious and political leaders called for a strike to denounce bloodshed after a suicide bomber killed 43 people at a religious procession this week.

nodes.description: 卡拉奇证券交易所因罢工关闭，街道近乎空无一空
nodes.support_text: Karachi's streets were nearly empty today. The stock exchange, which normally operates on the first day of the year, was closed.

nodes.description: 内政部长称极端分子是巴基斯坦和伊斯兰教的敌人
nodes.support_text: Interior Minister Rehman Malik said militant groups were harming Pakistan. 'They are hired assassins. They are enemies of Pakistan. They are enemies of Islam,' he told reporters.

nodes.description: 塔利班在阿富汗边境至城市扩大暴力活动范围，包括军事机构周边
nodes.support_text: an attack on a mosque near the headquarters of the powerful military.

nodes.description: 武装分子试图推翻政府
nodes.support_text: 语义描述：武装分子试图推翻政府

nodes.description: 武装分子推行其品牌伊斯兰教
nodes.support_text: 语义描述：武装分子推行其品牌伊斯兰教

nodes.description: 卡拉奇大屠杀展示其势力范围扩大
nodes.support_text: 语义描述：卡拉奇大屠杀展示其势力范围扩大

edges.support_text: Local police have said 42 people were wounded. It is understood some people were trapped under rubble after a house collapsed.
Eye witnesses say they saw the bomber drive a vehicle onto the playing field and blow himself up.
The bomber struck as young men... were playing volleyball in front of a crowd of spectators.
The bombing has occurred on a day of protests against violence in Pakistan.
Karachi's streets were nearly empty today. The stock exchange... was closed.
Interior Minister Rehman Malik said militant groups were harming Pakistan.
an attack on a mosque near the headquarters of the powerful military.
